title: Disable all chat button
body: Could there be a voluntary "disable **ALL** text chat" so I don't have to put up with trolls anymore, and get **wrongfully instigated/reported**?

replies.body: There is an option to disable all chat by going OPTIONS > INTERFACE > CHAT > Show [all] chat.

If you're getting instigated by what someone says and _rightfully_ reported because of it, that is on you.

Luckily, there is already a button for that. It is in settings to disable all chat.

Multiple options to disable communication with other players!
1. You can write, in chat at everygame ~~(toxic in ranked mostly)~~, "**/mute all**". 
text/ping/emote will be block, you can unmute with the commande as well but it's faster to go with option 2. below.
2. You can also press tab and mute/unmute on will with the buttons there.
3. You can press "esc" and go on the _OPTIONS -> INTERFACE -> CHAT ->_ toggle the show all chat.
Hope it's helpful, see y'all :)
{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
Just hit the tab button and mute all of the players (and their pings if you deem that necessary too) one by one if you don't want to have to deal with them.
There is an option for it.
